Transactions are Not Showing Up or Pending Forever

A combination of factors can slow down the network and transactions could be pending and taking longer than normal to send. This could be a network issue and affecting all exchanges and clients.


Helpful Tools and Resources

  • See all the transactions that are pending here

Other Tips

  • If you get a transaction hash for your transaction but it isn't showing up on Aion Dashboard, you can check & replace the transaction with one with a higher nrg price
  • Add more tips

If you have any other questions, please let us know at support@aion.network
